description.en: Preparing for concerts, individual vocal training, basics of vocal techniques, performing publicly, participating in different music projects with orchestras, leading soloists etc., participating in events connected to the University of Tartu.
description.et: Kontsertkavade ettevalmistamine, individuaalne hääleseade, häälekasutus, vokaaltehnika põhialused, avalik esinemine, osalemine erinevates (suur)projektides koos orkestrite, tippsolistide jt-ga, osalemine Tartu Ülikooliga seotud üritustel.

objectives.en: To enable students of the University of Tartu to participate in women's choir practice.
objectives.et: Võimaldada Tartu Ülikooli üliõpilastel osaleda naiskoori praktilises töös.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon successfully completing the course students:
- have the necessary knowledge, skills and experience in singing in a female choir;
learning_outcomes.et: - omab kooris laulmiseks vajalikke teadmisi, oskusi ja kogemust;

learning_outcomes.en: - are familiar with elementary music theory and have basic knowledge about music;
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud muusika elementaarteooria ja baasteadmised;

learning_outcomes.en: - have acquired essential knowledge about the basics of vocal techniques; fit in the choir, listen the tuning and consider the rest of the chor while singing;
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud baasteadmised vokaaltehnika põhialustest ja sobitub lauldes koori, häälestub ja arvestab ülejäänud kooriga;

learning_outcomes.en: - have learnt the choir's repertoire for the respective year.
learning_outcomes.et: - on omandanud naiskoori vastava aasta repertuaari.
